title: Creative Sound Blaster X-Fi Platinum Fatal1ty Champion Serie

posts.text:
Creative Sound Blaster X-Fi Platinum Fatal1ty Champion Series
Óska eftir tilboði eða skipti fyrir góðan örgjörva

http://www.mjac.co.uk/_articles/creativexfidriverissueswindows7/platinumfatal1tychampionseries.jpg
Tech Specs
	Standard Memory 	 	64 MB
# 	Package Contents 	 	Sound Blaster X-Fi Platinum Fatal1ty Champion Series Sound Card
# X-Fi I/O Drive with screws and cable for installation
# Remote control with 2 AA batteries
# 2 MIDI adapter cables (mini-to-standard)
# 1/8-inch to 1/4-inch plug adapter
# Power splitter cable
# Quick Start leaflet
# Installation CD

	Form Factor 	 	Internal
	Interfaces/Ports 	 	1 x Audio Line In - Mic In
1 x Audio Line Out - (Front)
1 x Audio Line Out - (Rear)
1 x Audio Line Out - (Center/Subwoofer)
1 x
1 x 4-pin - (Aux In)
1 x 4-pin - (CD In)

# Enhanced SoundFont support up to 24-bit resolution
# EAX ADVANCED HD
# X-Fi Crystalizer
# X-Fi CMSS-3D technology

Output (Optical and Coaxial)
	Memory Technology 	 	X-RAM
	Host Interface 	 	PCI

http://www.creative.com
# 	System Requirements 	 	Microsoft Windows Vista or Windows XP with Service Pack 2/x64 or Media Center Edition
# 1GHz Intel Pentium III, AMD or equivalent processor
# 256MB RAM (512MB for Windows Vista)
# 600MB of free hard disk space
# PCI 2.1 slot
# CD/DVD-ROM drive
# Graphics card with DirectX 9 compliant 3D graphics accelerator
